questiontext: This pencil is really old. You can / throw away / it. (Correct the form of the verb)
question_requirement: Correct the form of the verb
optiona: This pencil is really old. You can throw it away
optionb: This pencil is really old. You can throw it away every day.
optionc: This pencil is really old. You can throw it aways
correctanswer: This pencil is really old. You can throw it away
explanation:
✅ الجواب الصحيح: This pencil is really old. You can throw it away
📌 راجع قاعدة Correct the form of the verb في الكتاب المدرسي

questiontext: An average of eight hours a night is about right. (Use an Imperative to give advice)
question_requirement: Use an Imperative to give advice
optiona: You should get enough steep.
optionb: Please get enough steep.
optiond: Don't forget to get enough steep.
correctanswer: Get enough steep
explanation:
✅ Imperative = أمر مباشر
📌 الشكل: ابدأ بالفعل مباشرة بدون subject
❌ لا تكتب You should أو Please
🔑 الجواب: Get enough steep

questiontext: These trousers were too long so (l\took up\them) to make them fit. (Put in the correct order)
optiona: took them up I
optionb: I up them took
correctanswer: I took them up
explanation:
✅ Phrasal Verb مع ضمير: الضمير يكون بين الكلمتين
📌 مثال: turn it down ✅ | turn down it ❌
📌 مع اسم: يمكن قبل أو بعد: turn down the music ✅
🔑 الجواب: I took them up

questiontext: She (wear) glasses, but now she has contact lenses. (Use the correct form of -used to)
question_requirement: Use the correct form of -used to
optiona: She used to wear glasses, but now she has contact lenses
optionb: was wearing
correctanswer: She used to wear glasses, but now she has contact lenses
explanation:
✅ used to + فعل = عادة ماضية انتهت
📌 مثال: I used to play football = كنت ألعب كرة (لكن الآن لا)
❌ النفي: didn't use to | السؤال: Did...use to?
🔑 الجواب: She used to wear glasses, but now she has contact lenses

questiontext: I (have) a bicycle, but someone (steal) it last week. (Use the correct form of [use to[ and the present or past simple)
optiona: was haveing

correctanswer: used to have a bicycle, but someone stole it last week
explanation:
✅ used to + فعل = عادة ماضية انتهت
📌 مثال: I used to play football = كنت ألعب كرة (لكن الآن لا)
❌ النفي: didn't use to | السؤال: Did...use to?
🔑 الجواب: used to have a bicycle, but someone stole it last week
